item.description:
On Monday nights Heritage Farm Ice Cream puts on FREE concerts across the street at The Sampas pavilion. They also sponsor a classic car show (begins at 6pm) -cars from days gone by.

Bring a chair or blanket ( and bug repellent) for the concert while the sun sets over the Merrimack River. Heritage It's a great night out!

 

*We will meetup at Heritage Farm - at the porch. I will have a meetup.com pin (or sign). Then, we can walk across to the Sampas Pavillion for the concert. My contact # is: 978.289.7679 in the event you may be late, or unable to find us. You can purchase something from their menu, ice cream, or beverage.... or bring your own. www.heritageicecream.com. This is a shared event with other meetup groups.

WHERE THIS IS AN ALL-OUTDOOR EVENT, RAIN CANCELS. I will update as close to 6pm in the event the weather is questionable.

 

GUMBO DIABLO:

Gumbo Diablo is a Boston-based quintet specializing in a sound they call pan-Americana – roots rock that crosses borders and boundaries. Mixing traditions such as zydeco and r&b from Louisiana, cumbia from Colombia, forro from Brazil, and modern roots-influenced rock, they have been amazing audiences since 2009 with their unique live performances. With a sound driven by soulful vocals, accordions, guitar, bass, drums, and percussion, Gumbo Diablo has the versatility to pack the dance floor, captivate a rock club, or hold court in a small restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meetup at Heritage- at the porch.Then, walk across for the concert. Please read info below for details
item.name: FREE Outdoor Concert On The River: GUMBO DIABLO
